title: Simran Jeet Singh Keeps Going
description:
As a kid, Simran Jeet Singh always looked for books that featured Sikh-Americans like him, but never found any. So he vowed to change that by writing one himself.

Order a copy of Fauja Singh Keeps Going from Penguin RandomHouse, Amazon, or an independent bookstore near you

Follow Simran online, or on Twitter and Instagram as @SikhProf

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
